subject: Re: Dentex Dental Website Update
preview: Hi Joel,  I hope you're well!  Thank you for completing this! I can confirm I can see it on our end.  Kind regards, Deana

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

I hope you're well!

Thank you for completing this! I can confirm I can see it on our end.

Kind regards,
Deana

Hi Deana,

Confirming the contact us form is redirected to thank you when submitted. Here is the link of the thank you page.
https://www.dentexdental.com.au/thank-you/

Hi Heath & Team,

Our team has advised us that the website 'contact us' form is missing a thank you page. Can you please create one for when someone completes this form: https://www.dentexdental.com.au/contact/.

Please confirm once completed.

Kind regards,
Deana

Hi Heath,

Awesome! I can see the change!

Thanks for your help.

Kind regards,
Deana

Hi Deana,

We are looking into this, Can you try using a different information(Email, Fullname, Phone, Message), It seems to be going to spam as you are using same details.

Hi Heath,

It's now just refreshing the page as shown below:


Kind regards,
Deana

Hi Deana,

Thanks for sending this through, we have replaced contact form 7 to gravityforms as it is having an issue.
Can you try now?

Hi Heath, I hope you're well. I just went through all the pages and noticed that a message pop-up appears rather than being redirected to the thank you page for the following:
  • Treatment > repairs/ relines
  • Treatment > initial consultation
  • Treatment > particle dentures
Can we redirect users visiting these pages to the thank you page? Kind regards, Deana

Hi Deana,

Sure, it seems that you are seeing a cached version, Can you try again? Let me know if this works for you?
https://www.dentexdental.com.au/contact/

Hi Heath,

Hope you're well.

The team have mentioned that none of the forms are leading to a thank you page. They all have the following message:


Can you please let us know what page the thank you page is triggering from? Can we set up a thank you page that the user is redirected to once they submit the enquiry form?

Kind regards,
Deana

Hi Deana,

We have made changes to the form. Can you please try now?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

We've just double checked, and the team mentioned the thank you page is actually a message, can you please create a page so we can use to re-direct the users.

Kind regards,
Deana

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Awesome! Thanks, looks great.

Kind regards,
Deana

Hi Deana,

That's fantastic!

We have created the Thank you page and ready for you to review.

Here's the link:
https://www.dentexdental.com.au/thank-you/

Let me know if you would like further changes.

Hi @rica done creating 'Thank you page'

https://www.dentexdental.com.au/thank-you/

Please check and let me know if we have any changes. Thanks

Time: +15mins
@jaime need your assistance with this. Thanks!

Hi Heath,

Hope you're well!

Can we please keep this copy generic, e.g., "Thank you for your enquiry; someone will be in contact with you"?

Let me know if this will work.

Kind regards,
Deana

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending
